package com.programs;

public class Secondprogram {

	public static void main(String[] args) {
		// TODO Auto-generated method stub

		//To find out Even or Odd
		
		int number = 1022;
		
		if (number % 2 == 0)
			
			System.out.println("Even number");
		
		else
			
			System.out.println("Odd number");
	}

}
